name: Red Chilli Powder
description: Premium quality red chilli powder with rich color and intense flavor. Carefully ground from the finest dried red chillies, this spice adds vibrant heat and color to your dishes.

name: Turmeric Powder
description: Organically grown turmeric with high curcumin content for vibrant color and numerous health benefits. Known for its earthy aroma and medicinal properties.

name: Garam Masala
description: A traditional blend of aromatic spices for authentic Indian flavor. Garam Masala enhances the taste of curries, rice dishes, and snacks with its warm and balanced spice mix.

name: Dhana Masala
description: Authentic Dhana Masala made with ground coriander seeds and select spices. Adds earthy, citrusy notes to curries, pickles, and vegetable dishes.
